issues.description: In PersonService, the methods savePerson, deletePerson, and getAllPersons are declared public in the template but were changed to protected in the solution. This visibility change prevents PersonResource (in a different package) from accessing these service methods, causing compilation errors in the solution.
issues.suggested_fix: Restore public visibility on savePerson, deletePerson, and getAllPersons in the solutionâ€™s PersonService so that PersonResource can invoke these methods across packages.
